results.title: A new therapeutic effect of simvastatin revealed by functional improvement in muscular dystrophy.
results.journal: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A
results.text_hl: Together, our findings highlight that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ substantially improves the overall health and function of @DISEASE_Muscular_Dystrophy_Duchenne @DISEASE_MESH:D020388 @@@dystrophic@@@ skeletal muscles and may provide an unexpected, novel therapy for @DISEASE_Muscular_Dystrophy_Duchenne @DISEASE_MESH:D020388 @@@DMD@@@ and related @<m>DISEASE_Neuromuscular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009468 @@@neuromuscular diseases@@@.
